learning_outcomes: Identify essential airport documents and locations
Ask for locations at the airport using 'Where is/are...?'

content.stimulus_en: I have a ticket for my ________. (vuelo)

content.prompt_es: Pregunta por la puerta de embarque:

content.stimulus_en:
A: Is your flight on time?
B: No, it is ________. (retrasado)

content.prompt_es: You need a passport to travel to another country.
Según el texto, ¿cómo es la maleta de Maria?
content.stimulus_en: Maria has a small suitcase. It is blue and light. She packs her clothes and a book. Maria is ready for her trip. She smiles and leaves for the airport.

content.title: Pronunciación: Airport
content.instructions: Escucha y repite enfocándote en la 'r'.

questions.prompt_es: ¿La 'p' inicial en 'passport' expulsa un poco de aire?

content.instructions: Escucha y repite la frase completa.
